Name: Piranha
About the game: In the sands of time, a lone warrior battles with mammoth giants called Piranhas, collects power as he walks through the blizzards of the desert, snow fields and perilous forests, killing Piranhas with his sword, his goal is to takeover the castle in each level and enter the magical portal to reach the next level. Use abilities which are unlocked by obtaining pickups scattered throughout the level to kill the monsters called 'Piranhas' in the level, or use basic combat for the same. Explore the level to find the portal in the scene to reach the next level. As you kill more Piranhas, you receive more XP and reach higher progression levels.
